<file>
00001| import './globals.css';
00002| import type { Metadata } from 'next';
00003| import { Inter } from 'next/font/google';
00004| import { Toaster } from '@/components/ui/sonner';
00005| 
00006| const inter = Inter({ subsets: ['latin'] });
00007| 
00008| export const metadata: Metadata = {
00009|   title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00010|   description: 'The European translation platform built for European languages and culture. Professional domain expertise, custom glossaries, and intelligent AI. Based in Europe, for Europe.',
00011|   keywords: 'european translation, EU languages, european translator, linguala, multilingual europe, professional translation, domain expertise',
00012|   authors: [{ name: 'Linguala Europe' }],
00013|   creator: 'Linguala',
00014|   publisher: 'Linguala Europe',
00015|   robots: 'index, follow',
00016|   openGraph: {
00017|     type: 'website',
00018|     locale: 'en_EU',
00019|     url: 'https://linguala.eu',
00020|     title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',

00037|
